page.title: 03FIFE SHOW
page.content: The Fife Agricultural Show is heid in May each years.It is held at Balcormo Mains(Grid referance 406057).It can be reached by driving along the A915 east to Upper Largo then turn onto a minor road towards Cupar.Follow that road in a northerly direction and take the second left.The show area is 3km north of Largo and 7km NE of Leven.The show is a meeting place for farmers and exhibitors from as far afield as Oldham and Peterhead. The show usually includes competitions in the full range of cattle e.g. beef and dairy,horses e.g show jumping carriages and Clydesdales,poultry, dairy produce,home baking,pets corner etc.There are stands advertising farm machinery and household goods.At various times there are also displays by the RAF,Army and Navy.
